about_the_game:
Execute the following file to start DLC.
C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Hentai Seek Girl\HentaiSeekGirl-HentaiBooks\Game.exe


This DLC allows you to browse the creative books of the characters.
Talk to the women who appeared on stage.
You can read their original story comics.

Method of operation:
An event occurs when you operate a character and talk to a woman.
The comic can operate the page with the button.

You can enjoy books with 5 women in all.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Recommended:

short_description: Release their original manga and support multiple languages. DLC full of volumes with beautiful illustrations.
